title: Collected Stories
description: From the celebrated author of The Lost Language of Cranes and While England Sleeps , an important literary the complete collected short fiction.This handsome edition gathers together stories from Family Dancing (a finalist for both the National Book Critics Circle Award and the PEN/Faulkner Prize), A Place I've Never Been , and The Marble Quilt , which has never before appeared in paperback. Critics have hailed these stories as "witty and elegant," "luminous, touching, and splendid."The publication of this collection affirms David Leavitt's mastery of the form, and reminds us why The New York Times has called him "one of his generation's most gifted writers."
author: David Leavitt
